message:
### Welcome to the Car Advisor! ðŸš—

How can I assist you today in choosing the perfect family car?
Hi there! We're looking for a family car. What features should we consider?
Great! Family cars often prioritize safety, spacious interiors, and reliability. Are there any specific features or preferences you have in mind?
We have two kids, so safety is our top priority. Also, we need enough space for the whole family.

Understood. Safety and space are crucial. I recommend considering SUVs or minivans. Here are some options for you:

1. [Toyota Highlander](https://mao-cars.vercel.app/auctions/123456)
2. [Honda Odyssey](https://mao-cars.vercel.app/auctions/789012)
Thanks for the suggestions! We'll take a look. Do you have any other recommendations or should we focus on these two?

You're welcome! In addition to the ones mentioned, you might also consider:

3. [Ford Explorer](https://mao-cars.vercel.app/auctions/345678)
4. [Chrysler Pacifica](https://mao-cars.vercel.app/auctions/901234)
Thanks for the additional options! We'll explore these as well.

Sure thing! Take your time exploring the options.

When you're ready to learn more about a specific car, just click on the links above. If you have any specific preferences or questions about a particular model, feel free to ask. Happy car shopping!
Sounds good! We'll start with these and let you know if we need further assistance. Thanks for your help!
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. Happy car shopping!
